Mixer Logo Mixer is a Seattle-based video game live streaming platform owned by Microsoft. The service officially launched on January 5, 2016, as Beam but was renamed Mixer in May 2017. Source
You can download the Mixer logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Mixer
item.description: Mixer is a Seattle-based video game live streaming platform owned by Microsoft. The service officially launched on January 5, 2016, as Beam but was renamed Mixer in May 2017. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Twitch Logo
Twitch (stylized as twitch) is a live streaming video platform owned by Twitch Interactive, a subsidiary of Amazon. Introduced in June 2011 as a spin-off of the general-interest streaming platform, Justin.tv, the site primarily focuses on video game live streaming, including broadcasts of eSports competitions, in addition to music broadcasts, creative content, and more recently, “in real life” streams. Content on the site can be viewed either live or via video on demand.
You can download the Twitch logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Twitch
item.description: Twitch (stylized as twitch) is a live streaming video platform owned by Twitch Interactive, a subsidiary of Amazon. Introduced in June 2011 as a spin-off of the general-interest streaming platform, Justin.tv, the site primarily focuses on video game live streaming, including broadcasts of eSports competitions, in addition to music broadcasts, creative content, and more recently, “in real life” streams. Content on the site can be viewed either live or via video on demand.
